items.sentence: Is there any chance that Tom will get arrested?
Tom and Mary have a long distance relationship.
Tom and Mary have been friends for three years.
Tom and Mary have been married for three years.
Tom and Mary listened to the sounds of the sea.
Tom and Mary looked at each other and shrugged.
The heavy rain prevented us from going fishing.
Did you tell Tom why you wanted him to do that?
Did you vote in the last presidential election?
Did your family eat dinner together last night?
Mary is the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever met.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her younger sister.
Tom always seems to be doing something illegal.
Tom always seems to be unhappy about something.
Tom and Mary are having lunch in the cafeteria.
I wish I had a little more time to finish this.
I wish I had known about this when I was a kid.
I wish I had someone to tell all my secrets to.
I wonder what Tom\'s motive for doing that was.
It\'s been three weeks since Tom broke his arm.
